History of Present Illness (HPI): The patient expresses feelings of being down on herself and life, mentioning a pending divorce and worries about past mistakes with her daughters as they approach adulthood. Current Functional Status: The patient describes her current state as one of being tired but managing to get through her day-to-day activities. She sometimes takes naps when possible.
